extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Such a huge crystal!\. That's almost overkill to be honest.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Такой огромный кристалл!\. Если честно, это почти перебор.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh yeah!\. I heard about that one.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: А, да!\. Я слышал об этом.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: This crystal serves as a unique landmark.
Apparently this helps players to not get lost.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: По-видимому, он помогает игрокам не заблудиться.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I see...
Thanks for the developer's commentary, I guess!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ну что, спасибо за комментарий от разработчика!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Let's go back!
Wow!\. So pretty.
How is this POSSIBLE?!
It was \c[3]RIGHT THERE\c[0]!
I don't know, it just happened!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Я не знаю, просто так получилось!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I mean...\. you missed it as well, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: В смысле...\. ты ведь тоже промахнулся мимо неё, да?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well, I jumped down without thinking because you were standing down here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ну, я спрыгнул, не подумав, потому что тут снизу стоял ты.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh, so that's my fault now as well?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: А, так я и в этом виноват?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi...
Oh, hello Lea.
What?
Well...\. we both jumped down here, but...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ну...\. мы оба спрыгнули сюда, но...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We forgot to press that floor switch first.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Забыли перед этим нажать на ту кнопку.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So the jump panel is still off and we're stuck down here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Поэтому панель для прыжков всё ещё выключена, а мы застряли здесь внизу.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You remembered to push the switch, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ты ведь не забыла нажать на кнопку?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
Good for you!
[shakes head]
Ouch...
You too?!
Well, it happened.
Time for some backtracking.
That's a whole lot of crystal enemies in this place!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Много тут кристальных врагов в одном месте!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Let's crush them all and make colorful jewelry out of their remains!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Давай их всех раздавим и сделаем из их останков разноцветные украшения!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yuck!\. You can't do that!
Yeah, I know...\. one can only dream.
Please don't dream stuff like that!
Huh...\. I guess all the crystals are gone now.
No worries.\. I'm sure they'll be back soon enough.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Не волнуйся.\. Я уверена, они скоро вернутся.
